name: Phnom Sombok
excerpt: This small hill with an active wat offers the best views across the Mekong on this stretch of the river. Located on the road from Kratie to Kampi, a visit…

name: Wat Roka Kandal
excerpt: This beautiful little temple dating from the 19th century is one of the oldest in the region. The restored interior now houses a small handicraft centre…

name: Wat Sorsor Moi Roi

name: Mekong Turtle Conservation Centre
excerpt: This rundown (but well-meaning) wildlife conservation centre lies within the temple grounds of Wat Sorsor Moi Roi in Sambor, about 35km north of Kratie…

name: Chhlong
